attributes.action: Stop the refugees coming into england, and help our young & homeless find homes
attributes.additional_details:
Isis has claimed theve brought over thousands of undercover hidden amongst refugees, and are preaching in all countrys saying that there goin to take over europe and there soon going to be the majority.
 
There tellin the school boards that they have to celebrate muslims holiday but they will not celebrate our christian ones, they are stopping the children from wearing santa hats, wont let them celebrate Christmas and are now making them sing muslims hymns but they wont sing our christian ones.
attributes.background: Stop bringing in thousands of undercover isis and immigrants, giving them free homes, and support our own homless ex service men, and our younger generations who are stuggling to find houses and stop giving tax payers money to people who arnt willing to contribute any money back to society
